sentences: While Verizon aims to streamline operations by reducing its workforce to 99,600 employees by the end of 2024, competitors like AT&T, T-Mobile, and Comcast are focusing on expanding their services and workforce to adapt to the rapidly changing telecommunications landscape
This strategic downsizing contrasts sharply with the growth tactics of its rivals, highlighting Verizon's unique approach to cost management and efficiency.

boundStatOrQuote.span: Verizon employed 99,600 workers at the end of 2024.
